name: Curse of Mathkhet
description:
Play as an avid tomb explorer who set out to take the treasures of Mathkhet, an extraordinary Ancient Egyptian pharaoh.

Mathkhet loved math and decided to use it as a defense mechanism in his tomb. So arm yourself with numbers and  onwards to adventure!

This game will literally make you count and don't forget to conserve your supplies and make them count too!

Controls:

WASD - move
Spacebar - jump
E - use and interact
Mouse - look around
Left mouse button - shoot
Right mouse button - toggle torch
